TEXT.TITLE: MODULINE INTERNATIONAL <MDLN> 3RD QTR OPER LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Qtr ended Dec 31 Oper shr loss two cts vs loss 92 cts Oper net loss 28,045 vs loss 1,040,700 Sales 4,943,584 vs 5,613,400 Nine mths Oper shr profit 11 cts vs loss 93 cts Oper net profit 124,434, vs loss 1,054,000 Sales 22.6 mln vs 26.3 mln (Mouduline International Inc) Note: oper data does not include 1986 gains from tax benefit carryforwards of 30,000 dlrs, or three cts per shr, in qtr and 110,000 dlrs, or ten cts per shr, in nine mths. Reuter
